attributes.review:
hands-down the worst app i’ve ever experienced on the app store. terrible. 
1. it took 73 days to download.
2. it crashes my entire phone whenever i open the app.
3. very unorganized, user-friendliness is far less than adequate.
4. there seems to have been little-to-no fact checking involved in the production of this app. PROPAGANDA AND BS.
5. the app is completely useless.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.review: I expected better from my absolutely wonderful president. Who totally isn’t homophobic, racist and totally respects women. This app took several days to download. I expected so much better
